entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Beaver Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:50 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaver Creek Airport 07:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -38.5°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -42.3°C
Wind: ENE 12 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 57 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
